page.title: 06Annan By-Pass
page.content: One of the big topics just now is about the by _pass project to the north of Annan. There has been lots of crashes on the road and a baby was killed at Eastriggs this week.The by_pass will be part of the A75 Euroroute from Gretna to Stranraer. It will stretch from Gretna beyond Annan and will miss out the villages of the Rigg and Eastriggs as well as the town of Annan. The new by-pass will go very close to our school and it will be possible to see the traffic from our upstairs classrooms. Two roads near the school will have to be blocked off and this will make it more difficult for people who are employed at Chapelcross to get to their work.
